newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Falmac first half profit down 31 percent.
newsitem.headline: Falmac first half profit down 31 percent.

text.p: Singapore's Falmac Ltd said on Saturday group net profits in the six months ending November 30 fell 31 percent to Singapore $213,000.
The second-board listed precision engineering manufacturer said in a statement turnover rose to $9.75 million from $9.25 million in the first half of the previous financial year.
It said sales grew because its Tianjin subsidiary in China had started selling machines into the Chinese market.
Falmac said the expiry of the company's post pioneer tax incentive status led to a 57.14 percent growth in taxes to 165,000 --Singapore Newsroom (+65-870-3093)
